info.name: Pia mater
info.description: The pia mater is the fine textured, innermost layer of the meninges. It is intimately attached to the surface of the brain and spinal cord.
info.item: /Sections/Thin, Spinal Cord to Cerebrum/8 Cervical cord, C1
/Sections/Thin, Spinal Cord to Cerebrum/9 Cord-Medulla Junction
/Sections/Thin, Spinal Cord to Cerebrum/6 Cervical cord, middle
